name: Morning Starlight
description: Grumpy, a researcher aboard the space station, is looking for you to do an urgent task. It seems to have something to do with a top-secret experiment, and Herta's shadow looms behind it as well...
introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Researcher Grumpy from the space station has invited you to participate in a mysterious test. It's said that Herta herself is backing the project, and now you have the pleasure of being nominated by her, again...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● After the event begins, a new challenge stage will open daily, totaling 7 stages.
● Each challenge stage has 2 difficulty levels: Dwarf Star and Supergiant Star. Completing the Dwarf Star challenge unlocks the Supergiant Star difficulty.
● Each challenge stage features a fixed stage mechanism that provides buff effects to characters.
● In the Supergiant Star difficulty, defeating all 6 waves of enemies before the end of the Cycle will earn a Perfect Win rating.
● Energy regenerated by ally characters when defeating enemy targets is 50% in the Morning Starlight event compared to regular battles.
● As Trailblazers increase their Equilibrium Level, enemy strength will increase accordingly.
● Trailblazers can choose trial characters to participate in the challenge.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event period, rewards can be claimed via Limited-Time Rewards upon achieving specific challenge goals within the stages.
